nodes.text: The Mhalanduin Reformation was a reformation in the Imperial Era, signed on the Mhalanduin system, around which there were disputes in the ranks of the Imperial command. Apparently, the essence of the reformation was to limit flights into the Wild Space beyond the Western Reaches.

Two families were responsible for the implementation, which could not come to a unanimous opinion regarding the reformation. Conan Antonio Motti ended the dispute over the reformation by annihilating the top ranks of both families and appointing his own hand-picked general as regent, and he cut a swath through Wild Space, his cruisers' turbolasers incinerating any who dared protest the arrival of Imperial authority.
